title: Archie Halloween Blowout
description: No tricks here-- this 113 page Digital Exclusive is a real treat! Join Archie and the gang in some spooky fun. From haunted houses to Halloween parties, Riverdale knows how to do the monster mash! What will everyone dress up as this year? Read on to find out! Featuring a special guest appearance by Sabrina the Teenage Witch!
author: Various
